greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n X n integer matrices (m_{i,j}) such that m_{1,1}=0, m_{n,n}=2, and all rows, columns, and falling diagonals are (weakly) monotonic without jumps of 2.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 07 2019
